description: This flannel-lined jacket delivers comfort on the trail with its soft inside and waterproof-breathable shell. Lightweight, 80g insulation adds extra warmth and comfort.  Tons of secure pockets, adjustable cuffs, and a weather-ready hood.
name: Columbia Sportswear Landroamer Lined Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 80g Microtemp XF II - 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
